subtitleNullable: MNIST Model for Recognition of the Digits in Typographic Fonts in Italics
descriptionNullable:
### Context

Research, whether trained for MNIST model, can be successfully applied to recognize non-handwritten digits.


### Content

Train the model by dataset MNIST-digits (60 thousand images).
Take the numbers 0 ... 9 (screenshot from Word) and try to recognize them.
Look at which numbers were better recognized, and which ones were worse.


### Acknowledgements

* [National Institute of Standards and Technology](https://www.nist.gov/)
* notebook [CNN over MNIST](https://www.kaggle.com/mosius/cnn-over-mnist)
* dataset [MNIST Original](https://www.kaggle.com/avnishnish/mnist-original)


### Inspiration

Research, whether trained for MNIST model, can be successfully applied to recognize non-handwritten digits.
title: MNIST models testing: typographic digits
